thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Shopping trip
thread.title_full: Shopping trip - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ginao39
title: Shopping trip
text: Great hotel right next to westfield easy to park the car in the shopping centre and walk through ! The hotel is lovely and modern and very clean ! The room was adequate for 3 of us beds so comfortable as always at a premier ! Breakfast was plentiful and well worth the money ! We went into London by tube and the guy at station was so helpful too will be returning x
